page.title: 08Alison's Friday 7.00_8.30
page.content: My friday starts at about 7.00 am in the morning.This leaves me with an hour to get ready for{school,}have my breakfast and feed my pets. Our school uniform is black and white .I wear a black skirt ,a white blouse ,a black cardigan ,black shoes and a black tie with thin gold stripes After getting dressed I have my {breakfast}which usually consists of a cup of tea and a bowl of Rice Krispies or a bowl of Kellogs Branflakes . After this ,I go outside into our back garden and feed my pets .I have several goldfish , one dwarf rabbit , five bantoms and one dog. At 8.oo am I leave my house and walk about half a mile to the Bus_stop.The{bus}comes at about 8.15 and we travel four miles to Street where I go to school. The school is called Crispin{Comprehensive}and the
